member.name: M:KidsManagement.Services.Groups.GroupsService.GetAllForSelection(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all groups that are assigned to a specific teacher by teacherId

member.name: M:KidsManagement.Services.Groups.GroupsService.GetAllForSelection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets all groups including those with an already assigned teacher(true) or only thse without one (false)
